original_text: A mind that chooses to do wicked things. Feet that hurry to do evil things. A mind that chooses to do wicked things.
korean_text: 악한 계교를 꾀하는 마음과 빨리 악으로 달려가는 발과

sentences.original_text: A mind that chooses to do wicked things
Feet that hurry to do evil things
A mind that chooses to do wicked things
